publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7707 Marilyn Livingstone: Congratulations to Margaret Mullenâ€”That the Parliament congratulates Margaret Mullen, the school crossing warden for Dysart Primary School, who was appointed an MBE in the 2011 New Year Honours list for services to education; commends Margaret for her long service and dedication to the safety of children at Dysart Primary School, and welcomes the award on behalf of the headteacher, staff, children and parents at Dysart Primary School to their much-loved crossing warden.
S3M-7707 Congratulations to Margaret Mullen (lodged on 14 January 2011) Jamie McGrigor*, Dr Richard Simpson*, John Park*, Trish Godman*, Mary Mulligan*, Mr Frank McAveety*
